typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		payment_type as string,
		fare_amount as string,
		surcharge as string,
		mta_tax as string,
		tip_amount as string,
		tolls_amount as string,
		total_amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TripDataCSV
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		payment_type as string,
		fare_amount as string,
		surcharge as string,
		mta_tax as string,
		tip_amount as string,
		tolls_amount as string,
		total_amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TripFaresCSV
TripDataCSV, TripFaresCSV join(TripDataCSV@medallion == TripFaresCSV@medallion
	&& TripDataCSV@hack_license == TripFaresCSV@hack_license
	&& TripDataCSV@vendor_id == TripFaresCSV@vendor_id
	&& TripDataCSV@pickup_datetime == TripFaresCSV@pickup_datetime,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoinWithTripFares
InnerJoinWithTripFares aggregate(groupBy(TripDataCSV@payment_type),
	average_fare = avg(toInteger(TripFaresCSV@total_amount))) ~> AggregateByPaymentType
AggregateByPaymentType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SynapseSink
